metadata.title: CVE-2017-14114 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: RTPproxy through 2.2.alpha.20160822 has a NAT feature that results in notproperly determining the IP address and port number of the legitimaterecipient of RTP traffic, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation or cause a denial of service (communication outage) via craftedRTP packets.

criterions.comment: rtpproxy package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
